author: cms-l1t-offline
body:
This the 80x PR for L1T emulation software tagged as tsg-v9.

This is an improved version of the PR #15661 in memory consumption and timing.  
- The changes are in EMTF emulator, where  4D vectors are replaced by typedef struct's containing arrays. The improvement is in the EMTF emulator memory consumption (by ~75%) and time performance (~50%).  The l1t emulation is bitwise identical before and after these changes, as expected. 

This is the version of the L1T  software intended for MC production. 
- It is identical to the l1t-integration-v85.1 tag of the L1T Software.  Included features of the tags up to this latest one are tracked on the [twiki](https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/view/CMSPublic/SWGuideL1TOfflineDev#Status_of_Integration)

Some remarks:
- Fixes in high pT muons in EMTF and the use of 2nd earliest arriving LCT are included.
- BMTF emulator uses RPCs although not present in data.  The firmware will be changed soon to use the RPCs as well. 
- Old calorimeter calibration constants are used. The derivation of the new ones is still ongoing, and 
  is not to be used in the MC production.
title: Pr80x l1t-tsg-v9 for Sept 2016 MC production
